name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nilou's Grace: A Genshin Impact Live Wallpaper for Your Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nilou's Grace: A Genshin Impact live wallpaper featuring a clock and Google search bar for an elegant new tab experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Genshin Impact with Nilouâ€™s graceful presence as your live wallpaper. This extension blends her serene beauty with practical tools like a built-in clock and Google search bar, creating a harmonious mix of elegance and functionality for your browser.

Extension Features
Live Wallpaper: Showcasing Nilou's iconic design from Genshin Impact.
Built-in Clock: A stylish clock for easy timekeeping.
Google Search Bar: Quick access to search directly from your tab.
Optimized Performance: Lightweight and smooth operation.
Perfect for Fans: Adds a touch of Genshin Impact charm to every tab.
